title: Geo Circle
description: A circular region of a particular radius centered on a GeoCoordinate.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: The unique identifier of the circle.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of what the circle contains.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: The length of the radius of the circle. This value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
